cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.CY. 

This paper deals with secret sharing schemes, which are commonly studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR) communities. The paper also uses linear codes, which are a fundamental tool in coding theory (cs.DM) and error-correcting codes (cs.CC). The study of access structures is related to combinatorial mathematics (cs.DM) and graph theory (cs.CY).
